heading: About Me
paragraphs: I am a software engineer with a passion for Web Development and Open-Source Projects. I enjoy crafting Efficient, Scalable and Inspiring applications that solve real-world problems. My expertise includes JavaScript, Java, and a variety of web technologies. My favorite works are the ones that have a real impact on people's lives. I am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

Currently, I am a Software Engineer at Mont Gabaon Airlines. My role involves developing and maintaining web applications that enhance the user experience and productivity. I work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. I'm also involved in software security, network optimization, and flight tracking systems.

In the past, I have worked at BBOXX RDC as an Electronics Engineer and later as a Software Engineer. I was responsible for developing electronic systems and software applications for solar energy solutions and smart monitoring systems. I have also worked on various projects related to renewable energy and IoT.

I am ready to take on new challenges and contribute to exciting projects. If you are looking for a dedicated and skilled Software Engineer, feel free to reach out to me at rajjysrachid@gmail.com. In my spare time, I coach basketball and watch cartoons with my kids.
